article_title: Over Corned Beef In Cleveland, Scott Walker Confronted By Union Protesters
article_text:
About The Run 2016

The Run 2016 covers the machinations of the race for the White House, with news, analysis and pithy observations about candidates and issues. David Catanese is founder of The Run 2016. You can follow him on Twitter or reach him at dcatanese@usnews.com.

og.description: “We gave workers the choice, freedom to choose,” Walker said.
